template.name: Template HPE MSA 1040-2040 Plus
template.description:
Monitor HPE MSA storages models1040/2040+ (not for use with P2000G3 and lower).
Health shatuses in most cases: 0: OK 1: Degraded 2: Fault 3: N/A 4: Unknown

item_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ping check
item_prototype.description: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} with IP {#CONTROLLER.IP} ICMP ping check.

item_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status
item_prototype.description: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} with SN {#CONTROLLER.SN} and IP {#CONTROLLER.IP} health status.

trigger_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status is not OK
trigger_prototype.description: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} with SN {#CONTROLLER.SN} and IP {#CONTROLLER.IP} health status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}.

trigger_prototype.name: Web interface on controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ({#CONTROLLER.IP}) is down
trigger_prototype.description: Cannot connect to controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} web interface.

discovery_rule.name: Disk groups discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA disk groups.

item_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} health status
item_prototype.description:
Disk group {#DG.ID} with type {#DG.TYPE} health status.
0: OK 1: Degraded 2: Fault 3: Unknown 4: N/A

trigger_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} health status is not OK

discovery_rule.name: Physical disks discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA physical disks.

item_prototype.name: Physical diks in slot {#DISK.ID} health status
item_prototype.description:
Health status of physical disk in slot {#DISK.ID} with SN {#DISK.SN}.
0: OK 1: Degraded 2: Fault 3: N/A 4: Unknown

trigger_prototype.name: Physical disk in slot {#DISK.ID} is not OK
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk in slot {#DISK.ID} with SN {#DISK.SN} has status {ITEM.LASTVALUE}.

item_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} health status
item_prototype.description:
Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} with SN {#ENCLOSURE.SN} health status.
0: OK 1: Degraded 2: Fault 3: Unknown 4: N/A

trigger_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} health status is not OK
trigger_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} with SN {#ENCLOSURE.SN} health status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}.

item_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} health status
item_prototype.description:
Fan {#FAN.ID} in location "{#FAN.LOCATION}" health status.
0: OK 1: Degraded 2: Fault 3: N/A 4: Unknown

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} health status is not OK

item_prototype.name: Pool {#POOL.ID} health status
item_prototype.description:
Pool {#POOL.ID} with type {#POOL.TYPE} health status.
0: OK 1: Degraded 2: Fault 3: N/A 4: Unknown

trigger_prototype.name: Pool {#POOL.ID} health status is not OK

item_prototype.name: Port {#PORT.ID} health status
item_prototype.description:
Port {#PORT.ID} ({#PORT.SPEED}) with type {#PORT.TYPE} health status.
0: OK 1: Degraded 2: Fault 3: N/A 4: Unknown

trigger_prototype.name: Port {#PORT.ID} health status is not OK

discovery_rule.name: Power supplies discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA power supplies.

item_prototype.name: Power supply {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} health status
item_prototype.description:
Power supply {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} in location "{#POWERSUPPLY.LOCATION}" health status.
0: OK 1: Degraded 2: Fault 3: N/A 4: Unknown

trigger_prototype.name: Power supply {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} health status is not OK
trigger_prototype.description: Power supply {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} in {#POWERSUPPLY.LOCATION} health status is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}.

item_prototype.name: Volume {#VOLUME.ID} health status
item_prototype.description:
Volume {#VOLUME.ID} with type {#VOLUME.TYPE} health status.
0: OK 1: Degraded 2: Fault 3: N/A 4: Unknown

trigger_prototype.name: Volume {#VOLUME.ID} health status is not OK
